title: Drawing, Design for Serving Table with Two Drawers with Round Pulls, April 21, 1905
title_raw: Design for Serving Table with Two Drawers with Round Pulls
medium: Graphite on thin cream tracing paper
markings: Stamped in blue ink, upper right corner: APR 21 1905
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower center, below image: stock color oak / 4:0" long [unverted "V"]l=MU.- / 3.6" [inverted triangle]LI=MX-; and at lower right corner: NF[?]
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Rectangular body with 2 drawers at front, each with pair of round pulls; raised on 4 straight tapering legs; conforming lower shelf attaches  just above floor level; backsplash.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Serving Table with Two Drawers with Round Pulls, April 21, 1905. Graphite on thin cream tracing paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-76.
